function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential increase in social interactions due to higher temperatures may lead to greater transmission of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Higher transmission of contagious diseases, including SARS-CoV-2.","Mitigation":"Public health campaigns to educate the public on the continued risk of transmission regardless of temperature.","Technologies":"Public health communication tools, social media platforms.","People":"General population, particularly those in high-density areas.","Owner":"Health departments, government agencies."}]}
